page.title: 07SCHOOLS 3 (Secondary)
page.content: {WYMONDHAM HIGH SCHOOL (Mr Simms)} This is on a split site surrounded by sportsfields. It has 2 halls 2 gymnasia,4 craft rooms,4 homecraft rooms and a number of other specialist areas. Sports and other clubs meet after school. There are 4 'houses' Homan,Bannister,Ellis and Cheshire. The school is fed from two Middle and 6 Primary schools. Within the Lower School there are 8 mixed ability, 'house' based registration forms. For lessons these are split into two parallel ability groups which are further split into three or four ability groups for each subject. All children follow the same curriculum. Option choices are made at the start of the fourth year as the children enter the Upper School. The work is now based on examination requirements and houses play a lesser part.
